the game itself works great, not a problem, not even missing textures, but somehow the registry entries really messed up my (purchased) copy of the first game. any suggestions? already reinstalling it, hopefully that wont mess up ties that bind! =P

ok, I figured it out, the registry file included (setup.reg) contains a non-perfunctory binary ([HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Surreal\Riot Engine]
"SettingsDX105") which tailored the riot engine settings. simply delete this from the reg file or manually with regedit to avoid this problem should you own both games. deleting this value does not effect the playability of this release whatsoever.
errr meant perfunctory, anyway after about two hours of play through, one or two textures are still missing but its working at almost 100%

Someone help I've downloaded this game and unrar it and run the register file but when I run the game my monitro turn's off and I can hera but I dont see anything :S

@Mental_Downfall

This happens when your monitor does not support resolution that game uses. Normally you get at first start some kind of configuration window, but in this release when you add setup.reg to your registry it adds uploaders settings (which has resolution your monitor can't handle). To make your own settings: open regedit, locate entry "SettingsDX105" from HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Surreal\Riot Engine delete it and start SufferingTTB.exe, now riot engine configuration window should pop-up and you can choose video & sound settings that work on your system.
